name: Funkhaus
description:
We create highly tailored platforms online and in print, working side-by-side with premier brands to design websites and visual identities, build new technologies, and develop strategic content and branding.
We have clients all over the world, spanning various spheres of influence, from filmmakers like Roman Coppola and Ridley Scott, to artists like Mark Mothersbaugh and Saul Bass, to cultural heavyweights like The Hollywood Roosevelt and The Bradbury Building, to design-forward restaurants like Hinterland and Verlaine.
READ MORE...
